statement.name: final
statement.parts: /* 色MST取得 */ SELECT M1.IRO_CD ,M1.IRO_SEISIKI_NM ,M1.IRO_SEISIKI_NMK ,M1.IRO_RYAKU_NM ,M1.IRO_NM ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG ,M1.JYUSIN_YMD ,M1.JYUSIN_TM FROM MDMT0080 M1 WHERE M1.IRO_CD =
